snippet: Seeking to protect his cancer charity from more damage from his doping controversy, Lance Armstrong resigned from the organization’s board of directors.
abstract: Lance Armstrong, in wake of being stripped of his seven Tour de France titles for doping, cuts all official ties with Livestrong, charity he founded 15 years ago while he was treated for testicular cancer.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to protect his cancer charity from more damage from his doping controversy, Lance Armstrong resigned from the organization’s board of directors.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Cuts Officials Ties With His Livestrong Charity
headline.main: Armstrong Cuts Official Ties With Livestrong Charity
headline.print_headline: Armstrong Severs Ties With the Charity He Founded
